mapper.select: SELECT L.ALID,L.ALNAME,L.ALDESCRIPTION,L.SLCODE,SL.SLNAME,L.LCCODE,C.LCNAME,L.TID,E.EKNAME,SG.SGNAME, SC.SBJCATNAME,L.SBJCODE,S.SBJNAME,L.EGCODE,EG.EGNAME,L.TBCODE,T.TBNAME,S2.SBJNAME SBJNAME2,CC.CNAME FROM ALECTURE L INNER JOIN CDSUPPLEC SL ON L.SLCODE=SL.SLCODE INNER JOIN CDLECCATE C ON L.LCCODE=C.LCCODE INNER JOIN ATEACHER TCH ON L.TID=TCH.TID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON TCH.EID=E.EID INNER JOIN CDSUBJECT S ON L.SBJCODE=S.SBJCODE INNER JOIN CDSBJCATE SC ON S.SBJCATCODE=SC.SBJCATCODE INNER JOIN CDSCHGRADE SG ON S.SGCODE=SG.SGCODE INNER JOIN CDEXAMGRADE EG ON L.EGCODE=EG.EGCODE INNER JOIN CDTEXTBOOK T ON L.TBCODE=T.TBCODE INNER JOIN CDSUBJECT S2 ON T.SBJCODE=S2.SBJCODE INNER JOIN CDCURRICULUM CC ON T.CCODE=CC.CCODE ORDER BY L.ALID DESC
